Comparison of matric pass rates: The expert compared the matric pass rate of 60.6 percent in 2009 to 75.1 percent in the previous year, indicating an improvement in the education sector.
Increase in higher education enrollment: The expert mentioned that the number of students enrolled in higher education has increased from 500,000 in 1994 to almost one million, highlighting the growth in the sector.
Delivery of modern school facilities: The expert stated that the Accelerated Schools Infrastructure Delivery Initiative program has completed at least 187 schools, indicating progress in providing modern facilities to schools.
Employment of public servants: The expert mentioned that the state employs approximately one million public servants, indicating the size of the public sector workforce.
